alert.note: Alert for Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 3:19PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hunt County through 345 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Greenville City Lakes, or near Greenville, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Commerce, Campbell, Greenville City Lakes, Neylandville, Kellogg, South Sulphur, Center Point, Kingston, Dixon and Fairlie. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 90 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
